sentence.Network_en: We don't know what makes a sleepwalker.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不知道是什么原因导致人们梦游。

sentence.Network_en: The sleepwalker, unlike the hypnotized person, pays no attention to other people and does not take instructions.
sentence.Network_cn: 患梦游症的人和接受催眠的人不同, 他们不注意任何人也不接受别人的指令.

sentence.Network_en: Gerald moved toward her, silent as a sleepwalker, his stiff leg dragging.
sentence.Network_cn: 嘉乐向她走过来, 沉默得象梦游人似的, 慢吞吞地拖着一双木僵的腿儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 怎样才能不让梦游者（sleepwalker）梦游（walk in his sleep）呢？最简单的方法就是不让他睡觉。
Caligari的电影部落格所有文章 - 乐多日志 ... 《畸形人》 Freaks 《梦游鬼惊魂》 Sleepwalker 《绝命带原者》 Carriers.
英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... sleepless 失眠的 sleepwalker 梦游病者 sleepwalking 梦游病.
如果能够拥有艺术家黄国才设计的「梦游号」（Sleepwalker），结合铁架床及脚踏车，不用起床都可以「驾车」返工，必然是打工仔 …

list.abs: sleepwalker eyes open , people are clearly mistaken , and can answer some simple questions or order .梦游者眼睛张开，让人误以为是清醒的，而且可以回答一些简单问题或命令。
Some sleepwalkers talk in their sleep loudly enough ,, 有些梦游者睡着里大声说话,

they oversaw the finishing touches on the cartoons that had been in mid-production when the blow came and one imagines them sleepwalking through the studio like people in shock .他们监督收尾的漫画已在中期生产时，打击来了，想象他们梦游通过演播室人民一样感到震惊。
She told him she hurt her foot while sleepwalking !, 她说自己是在梦游的时候把脚弄伤的.

entry.def: If someone is sleepwalking, they are walking around while they are asleep.

example.ex: He once sleepwalked to the middle of the road outside his home at 1 a.m.
example.tran: 有一次，他在凌晨1点钟梦游走到了家门外的马路中央。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who walks about in their sleep

auth_sentence.content: I have never met anybody that is a sleepwalker, but I have, of course, heard about sleepwalking.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have never met anybody that is a sleepwalker, but I have, of course, heard about sleepwalking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have never met anybody that is a sleepwalker, but I have, of course, heard about sleepwalking.

sentences.en: The sleepwalker, unlike the hypnotized person, pays no attention to other people and does not take instructions.
sentences.cn: 患梦游症的人和接受催眠的人不同，他们不注意任何人也不接受别人的指令。
